mapper.sql: ID, `KEY`, SID, ASSIGNEE, GROUP_ID, ROLE_ID, ASSIGNEE_TYPE, ACTIVTI_NAME

delete.foreach: DELETE FROM dc_act_assignee WHERE `KEY` = #{item.key} AND SID = #{item.sid}

mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO dc_act_assignee (`KEY`, SID, ASSIGNEE, GROUP_ID, ROLE_ID, ASSIGNEE_TYPE, ACTIVTI_NAME) VALUES
( #{item.key}, #{item.sid}, #{item.assignee}, #{item.groupId}, #{item.roleId}, #{item.assigneeType}, #{item.activtiName} )

update dc_act_assignee
